attributes.action: Remove Victoria monument outside Buckingham Palace replace with Elizabeth 2nd
attributes.additional_details: Elizabeth 2 has been the longest serving monarch and an inspiration to our nation and world
attributes.background: Remove monument and safeguard in another area and install new monument for Elizabeth 2nd

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about monuments are a matter for the relevant governing body and planning authority, not the UK Government or Parliament.
